name: QSMP3
short_description: QSMP3 is a non-visual Delphi/Kylix component for playing MP3 files. It supports playing, stopping, seeking, pausing, and most other back-end functions needed for MP3 playback. It is designed to be compatible with both Linux -AND- Windows.
